en.description: I am from Taichung and have over 10 years of experience in software development. Recently, I stepped down from a management role to return to hands-on programming and continuously learn new technologies. Currently, I work at Wuju, focusing on game engine architecture and new game development, consistently applying my expertise to improve product quality and performance.

zh.description: 我來自台中市，擁有超過10年的程式開發經驗。近期離開管理職，回到第一線專注於學習新技術與撰寫程式。目前在珷琚公司負責遊戲底層架構及新遊戲開發，持續發揮專業能力，提升產品品質與效能。

en.description: I am proactive and eager to challenge myself, enjoying the exploration of new technologies and cross-disciplinary learning. Skilled in problem analysis and resolution, I am passionate about simplifying complex tasks through programming to boost team efficiency. I also excel at cross-department communication and collaboration, with strong execution skills and a strong sense of responsibility.

zh.description: 我積極主動，勇於挑戰自我，樂於嘗試新技術並跨領域學習。善於分析並解決問題，熱衷用程式簡化繁瑣流程，提升團隊整體效率，同時擅長跨部門溝通協作，具備強烈的執行力與責任感。
